action.description: The committee on CPC recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 6 Ayes: Representative(s) Matayoshi, Chun, Ilagan, Marten, Tam, Pierick; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Ichiyama, Iwamoto, Kong, Lowen.
